pages.text:
Locker Room Sports Cafe

Step into The Locker Room, the ultimate hangout spot where sports, good vibes, and great food come together. Designed with a true locker room feel, our bar combines the energy of game day with the comfort of a neighborhood pub.

With wall-to-wall big screens, you’ll never miss a play — whether it’s football under the lights, courtside basketball action, or fight night excitement. Grab a cold beer on tap, indulge in our signature wings, burgers, and shareable plates, and cheer on your team surrounded by fans who feel like family.

From pre-game happy hours to post-game celebrations, The Locker Room is your go-to spot for unforgettable nights, themed events, and unbeatable specials.

Whether you’re here for the big game, a night out with friends, or just looking for a place where the energy is always high — you’ll find it at The Locker Room Sports Café.

Connect with at Northwoods Mall
Locker Room Sports Cafe Open
